snippet: David Choe's rise in the art world has been nearly as intriguing as Facebook's ascendance in the social media world.
abstract: David Choe's rise in the art world has been nearly as intriguing as Facebook's ascendance in the social media world.
lead_paragraph: You've heard about David Choe, the graffiti artist, who is expected to become a multimillionaire because he took Facebook stock instead of cash to that decorate the halls of Facebook's first headquarters. Mark McDonald with the International Herald Tribune, provides a few more details about the artist. Read more »

headline.main: The Artist Who Thought Facebook Was 'Ridiculous'
